name: The Subterranean Trials of Drake and Serpent

steps.plaintext: Go to the ruins up ahead
steps.markdown: Go to the ruins up ahead

steps.plaintext: Examine the mechanism and open the great door
steps.markdown: Examine the mechanism and open the great door

steps.plaintext: Talk to the person on the second floor
steps.markdown: Talk to the person on the second floor

substeps.plaintext: Receive A Glimpse Into the Pale Night subquest: Investigating the inscribed map will light up the Enkanomiya Map
substeps.markdown: Receive ◀A Glimpse Into the Pale Night▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/A_Glimpse_Into_the_Pale_Night▷ subquest: Investigating the inscribed map will light up the ◀Enkanomiya▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Enkanomiya▷ ◀Map▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Map▷

substeps.plaintext: Skip to Step 11 if the Dull Golden Bridle was obtained before starting this step.
substeps.markdown: Skip to Step 11 if the ◀Dull Golden Bridle▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Dull_Golden_Bridle▷ was obtained before starting this step.

steps.plaintext: Go to the back of the library and seek out the Golden Bridle
steps.markdown: Go to the back of the library and seek out the ◀Golden Bridle▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Golden_Bridle▷

steps.plaintext: Investigate the rear of the library and solve the puzzle
steps.markdown: Investigate the rear of the library and solve the puzzle

substeps.plaintext: Activate the east and south Triangular Mechanisms

steps.plaintext: Go to the library and talk to Enjou
steps.markdown: Go to the library and talk to ◀Enjou▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Enjou▷

steps.plaintext: Follow Enjou's instructions and explore up ahead
steps.markdown: Follow Enjou's instructions and explore up ahead

steps.plaintext: Go to the broken bridge in front of the Dainichi Mikoshi
steps.markdown: Go to the broken bridge in front of the ◀Dainichi Mikoshi▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Dainichi_Mikoshi▷
